page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Watching television must be the nations top leisure activity.It's growing versatility has made it a permanent feature in most homes especially with its recent use with computors and videos. The presence of{organised groups such as scouts continues alongside specialised swimming and football clubs,the latter encouraged by the close proximity of Reading football ground.Joggers run along the roads and through the parkland,whilst the youth take to their BMX bikes.These trick cycles have perpetuated the importance of cycling as a favorite recreational pastime.Increasing leisure time encourages{home persuits;}reading, sewing and gardening,whilst a varied programme of events are attended at {The Hexagon,}the town's multi-function complex.
